mapper.insert: insert into board ( title, content) values ( #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regDate, viewCnt from board order by bno desc
select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, regDate = NOW() where bno = #{bno}
